bibl.title: Greek Magical Amulets. The Inscribed Gold, Silver, Copper, and Bronze Lamellae. Part I: Published Texts of Known Provenance.
bibl.note: Contains only those previously published texts whose provenances are known. Published materials of unknown provenance, as well as unpublished pieces are reserved for a subsequent volume.
bibl.seg: KOTANSKY Roy (Text and Commentary by), Greek Magical Amulets. The Inscribed Gold, Silver, Copper, and Bronze Lamellae. Part I: Published Texts of Known Provenance. (Papyrologica Coloniensia. XXII, 1.)
Opladen, Westdeutscher Verlag, 1994, 8Â°, xxviii-446 pp., 65 figg., 28 pll. ISBN 3-531-09936-1. DM 128.
Contains only those previously published texts whose provenances are known. Published materials of unknown provenance, as well as unpublished pieces are reserved for a subsequent volume.

C.R. par William M. Brashear, CP 91 (1996) pp. 375-377. - David Frankfurter, BMCRev 6 (1995) pp. 205-210 - David R. Jordan, JHS 116 (1996) pp. 233-235. - Christina Kakridi, Klio 79 (1997) pp. 207-208.
